column3: Description
Player Name
Nationality of the player.
Position
Current Age
Year of Birth
Matched Played
Games Started
Minutes
90s Played. Minutes played divided by 90.
Goals. Goals scored or allowed
Assists
Non-Penalty Goals
Penalty Kicks Made
Penalty Kicks Attempted
Yellow Cards
Red Cards
Goals Scored per 90 minutes. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Goals plus Assists minus Penalty Kicks made per 90 minutes. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Expected Goals. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts.
Non-Penalty Expected Goals per 90 minutes. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
xG Assisted. xG which follows a pass that assists a shot.
Non-Penalty Expected Goals plus xG Assisted per 90 minutes. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

Expected Goals plus Assist per 90 minutes. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted). Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Shots Total. Does not include penalty kicks.
Shots on target. Note: Shots on target do not include penalty kicks.
Shots on target percentage. Percentage of shots that are on target. Minimum .395 shots per squad game to qualify as a leader. Note: Shots on target do not include penalty kicks
Shots total per 90 minutes. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Shots on target per 90 minutes. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader. Note: Shots on target do not include penalty kicks
Goals per shot. Minimum .395 shots per squad game to qualify as a leader.
Goals per shot on target. Minimum .111 shots on target per squad game to qualify as a leader. Note: Shots on target do not include penalty kicks.
Average distance, in yards, from goal of all shots taken. Minimum .395 shots per squad game to qualify as a leader. Does not include penalty kicks.
Shots from free kicks.
Non-Penalty Expected Goals per shot. Minimum .395 shots per squad game to qualify as a leader.
Goals minus Expected Goals. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
Non-Penalty Goals minus Non-Penalty Expected Goals. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
Passes Completed.
Passes Attempted.
Pass Completion Percentage. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Total distance, in yards, that completed passes have traveled in any direction.
Progressive Distance. Total distance, in yards, that completed passes have traveled towards the opponent's goal. Note: Passes away from opponent's goal are counted as zero progressive yards.
Assists minus xG Assisted.
Passes that directly lead to a shot (assisted shots).
Completed passes that enter the 1/3 of the pitch closest to the goal. Not including set pieces.
Completed passes into the 18-yard box. Not including set pieces.
Completed crosses into the 18-yard box. Not including set pieces.

Progressive Passes. Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch
Live-ball passes.
Dead-ball passes. Includes free kicks, corner kicks, kick offs, throw-ins and goal kicks.
Completed pass sent between back defenders into open space.
Passes made while under pressure from opponent.
Passes that travel more than 40 yards of the width of the pitch.
Crosses.
Corner Kicks.
Inswinging Corner Kicks.
Outswinging Corner Kicks.
Straight Corner Kicks.
Ground passes.
Passes that leave the ground, but stay below shoulder-level.
Passes that are above shoulder-level at the peak height.
Passes attempted using left foot.
Passes attempted using right foot.
Passes attempted using head.
Throw-Ins taken.
Passes attempted using body parts other than the player's head or feet.
Offsides.
Intercepted.
Blocked by the opponent who was standing it the path.

Shot-Creating Actions. The two offensive actions directly leading to a shot, such as passes, dribbles and drawing fouls. Note: A single player can receive credit for multiple actions and the shot-taker can also receive credit.
Shot-Creating Actions per 90 minutes. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Completed live-ball passes that lead to a shot attempt.
Completed dead-ball passes that lead to a shot attempt. Includes free kicks, corner kicks, kick offs, throw-ins and goal kicks.
Successful dribbles that lead to a shot attempt.
Fouls drawn that lead to a shot attempt.
Defensive actions that lead to a shot attempt.

Goal-Creating Actions. The two offensive actions directly leading to a goal, such as passes, dribbles and drawing fouls. Note: A single player can receive credit for multiple actions and the shot-taker can also receive credit.
Goal-Creating Actions per 90 minutes. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader.
Number of players tackled.
Tackles in which the tackler's team won possession of the ball.
Tackles in defensive 1/3.
Tackles in middle 1/3.
Tackles in attacking 1/3.
Percentage of dribblers tackled. Dribblers tackled divided by dribblers tackled plus times dribbled past. Minimum .625 dribblers contested per squad game to qualify as a leader.
Number of times dribbled past by an opposing player.
Number of times the squad gained possession withing five seconds of applying pressure.
Successful Pressure Percentage. Percentage of time the squad gained possession withing five seconds of applying pressure. Minimum 6.44 pressures per squad game to qualify as a leader
Number of times blocking a shot that was on target, by standing in its path.
Number of times blocking a pass by standing in its path.
Number of players tackled plus number of interceptions.
Clearances.
Mistakes leading to an opponent's shot.
Number of times a player touched the ball. Note: Receiving a pass, then dribbling, then sending a pass counts as one touch.
Touches in defensive penalty area.
Touches in attacking penalty area.
Percentage of Dribbles Completed Successfully. Minimum .5 dribbles per squad game to qualify as a leader
Number of Players Dribbled Past.
Number of times a player dribbled the ball through an opposing player's legs.
Number of times the player controlled the ball with their feet.
Carries into the 18-yard box.
Number of times a player failed when attempting to gain control of a ball.
Number of times a player loses control of the ball after being tackled by an opposing player. Does not include attempted dribbles.
Number of times a player was the target of an attempted pass.
Number of times a player successfully received a pass.
Passes Received Percentage. Percentage of time a player successfully received a pass. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader.
Minutes Per Match Played.

Percentage of Minutes Played. Percentage of team's total minutes in which player was on the pitch. Player minutes played divided by team total minutes played. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader.
Minutes Per Match Started. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader.
Games as sub. Game or games player did not start, so as a substitute.
Minutes Per Substitution. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader.
Games as an unused substitute.
Points per Match. Average number of points earned by the team from matches in which the player appeared. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader.
Goals scored by team while on pitch.
Goals allowed by team while on pitch.
Plus/Minus. Goals scored minus goals allowed by the team while the player was on the pitch.
Plus/Minus per 90 Minutes. Goals scored minus goals allowed by the team while the player was on the pitch per 90 minutes played. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader.

Plus/Minus Net per 90 Minutes. Net goals per 90 minutes by the team while the player was on the pitch minus net goals allowed per 90 minutes by the team while the player was off the pitch. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader.
Expected goals by team while on pitch. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
Expected goals allowed by team while on pitch. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).

xG Plus/Minus. Expected goals scored minus expected goals allowed by the team while the player was on the pitch. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).

xG Plus/Minus per 90 Minutes. Expected goals scored minus expected goals allowed by the team while the player was on the pitch per 90 minutes played. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
Second Yellow Card.
Fouls Committed.
Penalty Kicks Won.
Penalty Kicks Conceded.
Own Goals.
Number of loose balls recovered.
Aerials won.
Aerials lost.
Percentage of aerials won. Minimum .97 aerial duels per squad game to qualify as a leader.
Competition Name
Competition ID, as per FBref.
Season.
Club name.
Country of the team/league.
3 digit nationality code
Tidied nationality
Primary position of the player.
Primary position groupedÂ - Goalkeeper, Defender, Midfielder, Forward.
Playering position is in goal or outfield.
Goals Against.
Goals Against per 90 minutes.
Shots on Target Against.
Save Percentage (Shots on Target Against - Goals Against)/Shots on Target Against. Note that not all shots on target are stopped by the keeper, many will be stopped by defenders.
Wins.
Draws.
Losses.
Clean Sheets. Full matches by goalkeeper where no goals are allowed.
Clean Sheet Percentage. Percentage of matches that result in clean sheets.
Penalty Kicks Allowed
Penalty Kicks Saved.
Penalty Kicks Missed.
Post-Shot Expected Goals. PSxG is expected goals based on how likely the goalkeeper is to save the shot xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).

Post-Shot Expected Goals per Shot on Target. Not including penalty kicks. PSxG is expected goals based on how likely the goalkeeper is to save the shot. Higher numbers indicate that shots on target faced are more difficult to stop and more likely to score.

Post-Shot Expected Goals minus Goals Allowed. Positive numbers suggest better luck or an above average ability to stop shots. PSxG is expected goals based on how likely the goalkeeper is to save the shot. Note: Does not include own goals. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).

Post-Shot Expected Goals minus Goals Allowed per 90 minutes. Positive numbers suggest better luck or an above average ability to stop shots. PSxG is expected goals based on how likely the goalkeeper is to save the shot. Note: Does not include own goals. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
Throws Attempted.
Percentage of Passes that were Launched. Not including goal kicks. Passes longer than 40 yards
Average length of passes, in yards. Not including goal kicks
Opponent's attempted crosses into penalty area
Number of crosses into penalty area which were successfully stopped by the goalkeeper
Percentage of crosses into penalty area which were successfully stopped by the goalkeeper
# of defensive actions outside of penalty area
Defensive actions outside of penalty area per 90 minutes
Average distance from goal (in yards) of all defensive actions
